name: Penny candy forest #1: Blueberry, Cotton Candy, Lemon, and Grape
description:
@Sugartivi | Dear art collector, when I was younger, my family used to visit a “restoration” village in Long Island, NY that was meant to reenact life in the 1800’s. It had beautiful country paths to get lost in, geese running around, and a blacksmith’s shop. At the general store, you could buy old fashioned candy sticks in hundreds of flavors. I would get lost just trying to choose one. My favorites were butterscotch and green apple. 

You can get lost in this candy forest too: To see it in AR, view this page on your iphone/ipad and press the little 3D icon in the corner of the image. Please have patience as it takes a while for the colors to load.
